name: Kiki Trick
description:
Kiki Trick is an arcade game developed by Nintendo. It was originally released in 2012. Nintendo published the game.
You can play Kiki Trick on Wii.
Yoshio Sakamoto produced the game. It was directed by Noriyuki Sato. It was scored by Daisuke Shiiba, Shinji Ushiroda and Shinobu Tanaka.
